definition: to cut/to slash/to scratch (cut into the surface of sth)/to strike (a match)
to delimit/to transfer/to assign/to plan/to draw (a line)/stroke of a Chinese character

sentences.english: Lishui City Planning Exhibition Hall warmly welcomes your arrival.
sentences.chinese: 麗水市城市規劃展覽館竭誠歡迎您的到來。

sentences.english: Urban planning from two-dimensional arrangement to three-dimensional planning began long time ago.
sentences.chinese: 城市規劃由平面的佈置轉向三維的規劃，歷史源遠。

sentences.english: They roughed out the city plan.
sentences.chinese: 他們畫出了城市規劃的草圖。

sentences.english: 10 a.m. - Head over to the Urban Planning Exhibition Center, a six story building, situated on People's Square.
sentences.chinese: 參觀位於人民廣場的上海城市規劃展示館。

sentences.english: He is currently visiting professor of planning at Oxford Brookes University.
sentences.chinese: 他現任牛津布魯克斯大學的城市規劃客座教授。

sentences.english: Promote urban planning for healthy behaviours and safety.
sentences.chinese: 在城市規劃中促進健康行爲和安全。

sentences.english: The Town Planning Ordinance was first enacted in 1939.
sentences.chinese: 《城市規劃條例》最初於一九三九年制定。

sentences.english: This thesis concern about taking the non-constructive land into city planning.
sentences.chinese: 本文以非建設用地納入城市規劃體系文研究課題。

sentences.english: Finally, he discusses the pursuance and creation the mode of planning.
sentences.chinese: 論述了中國城市規劃模式的追求與創造。

sentences.english: Since then, the Germans in Qingdao had a planned urban planning and construction.
sentences.chinese: 其後，德國人在青島進行了有計劃的城市規劃與建設。

sentences.english: Woo continues to be a leader in urban planning activities.
sentences.chinese: 胡先生一直在洛杉磯的城市規劃中擔任着領導角色。

sentences.english: The integration of urban engineering environment with the urban planing is closed.
sentences.chinese: 城市工程地質環境與城市規劃之間存在着密切的聯繫。

sentences.english: Professor Birch has lectured in the United States and abroad on city planning matters.
sentences.chinese: 伯奇教授常在美國及國外作城市規劃方面的演講。

sentences.english: Guan Zhong was the master of ancient Chinese city planning and construction.
sentences.chinese: 管仲堪稱中國古代城市規劃建設的一代宗師。

sentences.english: At last, the author brings forward some suggestions about Beijing's axle wire design.
sentences.chinese: 並對北京中軸線的城市規劃提出了一些建議。

sentences.english: However, the town-planning element needs to be improved.
sentences.chinese: 但是城市規劃的基礎設施需要提高。

definition: norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
